alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 9:04PM EDT until April 10 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Calhoun and Lexington Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County. .An intense storm system produced locally heavy rainfall across the Midlands. Rainfall amounts from 1 to 3 inches fell across the Midlands. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. At 119.0 feet, Extensive flooding occurs in the Congaree National Park. Some area farmland is flooded. Minor flooding occurs at the Carolina Eastman Facility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:54 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 109.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 120.1 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 400 PM EDT.
